items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: QRIP.ge helped us create a beautiful memorial for my grandmother. Now our whole family can visit her memorial page and share memories, no matter where they are in the world.

items.text: The QR code on my father's headstone has been scanned over 200 times. It's amazing how many people have been able to learn about his life and leave their own memories.
